data.name: Them and Us - Service Costume Pack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains 3 beautifully crafted models that we made for those interested in more mature content.

A modern French nurse costume:
Got some cuts and some bruises? Call the Nurse.

A housemaid costume:
Did all those monsters leave the Masters' mansion a mess? Call the maid.

A police officer costume:
Ready to protect and serve.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB Memory Minimum) | AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2 GB Memory Minimum)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or equivalent with 4GBs of VRAM
